00020 #include <cstdio>
00021 #include "rstring.h"
00022 
00023 namespace RDK2 { namespace RPrimitive {
00024 
00025     RDK2_FACTORY(RString);
00026 
00027     using RDK2::Object;
00028     using namespace std;
00029 
00030     RString::RString(string text) : value(text) { }
00031 
00032 
00033     Object* RString::clone() const{
00034         return new RString(value);
00035     }
00036 
00037     bool RString::hasStringRepresentation() const {
00038         return true;
00039     }
00040 
00041     std::string RString::getStringRepresentation() const {
00042         return value;
00043     }
00044 
00045     bool RString::loadFromStringRepresentation(const std::string&t) {
00046         value = t;
00047         return true;
00048     }
00049 
00050     void RString::read(RDK2::Serialization::Reader*r) throw (ReadingException) {
00051         r->startReading(getClassName());
00052             value = r->readString();
00053         r->doneReading();
00054     }
00055 
00056     void RString::write(RDK2::Serialization::Writer*w) const throw (WritingException)  {
00057         w->startWriting(getClassName());
00058             w->writeString(value);
00059         w->doneWriting();
00060     }
00061 
00062     std::vector<Object*> RString::getTestCases() const {
00063         std::vector<Object*> v;
00064         v.push_back(new RString("Hello"));
00065         v.push_back(new RString("Hello> >> ><a></b>"));
00066         v.push_back(new RString(" "));
00067         v.push_back(new RString(""));
00068         return v;
00069     }
00070 
00071     bool RString::equals(const Object*ob) const {
00072         const RString * s = dynamic_cast<const RString*>(ob);
00073         return s && (s->value == value);
00074     }
